lst.name: sentence
lst.str: For example, wheat grown in northern New South Wales (NSW) might move more efficiently to Brisbane, in Queensland, than to Sydney or Newcastle in New South Wales, it said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The AWB said the current approach of state-based bulk handling authorities is not essential, although it said it favoured the authorities maintaining at least their current level of control of storage and transport as long as quality was maintained.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Many AWB customers are becoming increasingly quality conscious, demanding strict adherence to contractual quality specifications," the board said in a submission to the Royal Commission into Grain Storage, Handling and Transport.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: For example, wheat grown in northern New South Wales (NSW) might move more efficiently to Brisbane, in Queensland, than to Sydney or Newcastle in New South Wales, it said.

lst.str: The AWB said the current approach of state-based bulk handling authorities is not essential, although it said it favoured the authorities maintaining at least their current level of control of storage and transport as long as quality was maintained.
